name: Extreme Climbing
description:
Climb to the top with your bare hands!

Only a mouse is needed to play this game.

There might be obstacles, but I entrust you to put them to their place - beneath you.

The game should run on any OS if it has JRE (if you can run Minecraft or Runescape, you can run this game).

check out my other games: https://sheudler.itch.io

if you would like to donate: https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=7Q34AB398D2QU

if you would like to donate Bitcoin, here's my Bitcoin address: 1diUgZyj4YWwEegqCJjFWuQDg3Kf1XV21

Please post links of your videos and reviews of the game in the comments!

sounds by: https://www.zapsplat.com, https://freesound.org/people/wi-photos/
